title: 1.13pre2联机求助
author: 神秘指令
txt_content:
本帖最后由 神秘指令 于 2018-6-16 21:00 编辑 

我跟我朋友联机，我朋友那边登不上去，总出这个，求解决
Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host
